Name: No Captain Allowed!
About the game: Play with 1-4 players online or local in this co-op roguelike game as you and the crew manage a vehicle to escape this crazy world. In your journey, level up, choose your skills and loot better gear from defeated enemies and rewards. But every important decision must be voted on with the crew, such as, quests, upgrades and the next destination. Vote on all big decisions along the journey, like quest choices, upgrades to buy, path to follow and much more! Navigate through a random generated map each time you start a new game! Level events, enemies, quests and even the final boss are randomized every match. Complete quests and loot enemies to find powerful weapons, shields and auras to help you defeat invaders and better manage your vehicle. Gain experience and get skill points to unlock new skills, play as Support, Fighter, Runner, or a combination of all of them! Play the way you want to! Confront Ice storms and the Green moon that will completely change enemies and invaders. Features Full controller support. Voice and text chat Play with 2 vehicles and unlock other 4 variations. Host your own private game or invite others if you want to. Matchmaking to quickly find a game online and host list. Change the difficulty between Normal, Hard and Insane. Reconnect System to not lose your character during a match. 21 Achievements on Steam Account level to measure your experience. English, Brazilian Portuguese and Spanish support. We are very proud to announce that we were finalist for the best Brazilian indie game of 2021 and also a recipient for the EPIC games Mega Grants Award!
